I’m Kezia Olive

An Educational Psychology Doctoral Researcher at University of Helsinki, Finland.

I currently study gendered motivational development, identifying factors that influence students’ outcomes in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM).

I list my blogposts and more interests down below – feel free to check my work from this webpage, and reach me through the contact details here to have a chat!

Phone: +358 50 473 6549
Email: kezia.olive@helsinki.com
Contact

View All Blogposts

Students' Motivational Development

I focus on identifying resources and barriers in students' learning -- individual factors (gender), or social factors (peers, teachers, family).

Educational Research Methodology

I work mostly with quantitative data, but eager for discussions related to improving how to gain insights from Educational data.

(Research) Career Development

There are so many ways to develop as a researcher, it is also always exciting to learn. I am absolutely open for a good chat about how we learn and grow!

Kezia Olive
